actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the legal public holiday for the birthday of George Washington take place on February 22, rather than on the third Monday in February.
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text: Changes the date of the observance of the birthday of President George Washington to February 22 of each year (currently, the third Monday in February).

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the legal public holiday for the birthday of George Washington take place on February 22, rather than on the third Monday in February.
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that the legal public holiday for the birthday of George Washington take place on February 22, rather than on the third Monday in February.
